channel.title: 10-4 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in 10-4 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Encryption Made for Police and Military Radios May Be Easily Cracked
item.description: Researchers found that an encryption algorithm likely used by law enforcement and special forces can have weaknesses that could allow an attacker to listen in.
